item.title: My First RS Script ~ That One Fletcher
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

NO ANTIRANDOMS INCLUDED, WATCH THE SCRIPT, I MADE FOR MYSELF TO WATCH
Directions:

  1. Have the script NOT covering runescape at all.
  2. Have 14 Strings In The Inventory (before bows)
  3. Have 14 Bows In Inventory
  4. Have Bows In 14th Spot In Bank
  5. Have Strings In 15th Spot In Bank
  6. Be in Lumbridge underground bank Right Next To Bank
    running the script~~
  7. Press Run
  8. A colorpicker will come up, click on the red of the underground lumby bank
  9. another colorpicker will come up, click on the grey of ur bowstring.
  10. MAKE SURE UR PIN IS PUT IN
    [scar]program New;
    {.include srl/srl.scar}
    var
    a,b,randomadd,bsc,found,color,strung,bankd,slen,blen,bowstring:integer;
    procedure loadbitmaps;
    begin
    bowstring := BitmapFromString(26, 23, ‘z78DAD5D4310E80200C05D0’ +
    ‘2BB506154707EF7F25071612685301E9A74347F36C3F256A2E4EF’ +
    ‘DDC8E189ED4C9B572490CE7B5DF9279BE0AC7934AF0CC2C46DB17’ +
    ‘667ECAAD6536678FC1466836B4E995A903737293B3BF7769F5EDF’ +
    ‘7F4DF7621FD7B653EAE99D1BF5C498BC1E99067C9596A112ED82A’ +
    ‘2A80CDB2AAA289B6CA6B4598982E31646CEC9D678BC4621B7BE73’ +
    ‘FCE64E17A011C02B693’);
    end;
    procedure randomplox;
    begin
    randomadd := random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1);
    mousespeed := 5+randomadd+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1)+random(1);
    end;
    procedure Bank;
    begin
    bankd := bankd+1;
    if(findcolor(a,b,color,212,88,394,274))then
    begin
    randomplox;
    Mouse(a,b,2,2,true)
    randomplox;
    wait(750+randomadd)
    Mouse(333,114,2,2,false)
    randomplox;
    wait(300+randomadd)
    Mouse(314,190,2,2,true)
    randomplox;
    wait(300+randomadd)
    Mouse(628,335,2,2,false)
    randomplox;
    wait(300+randomadd)
    Mouse(630,410,2,2,true)
    randomplox;
    wait(300+randomadd)
    Mouse(375,116,2,2,false)
    randomplox;
    wait(300+randomadd)
    Mouse(368,191,2,2,true)
    randomplox;
    wait(300+randomadd)
    MMouse(487,40,3,3)
    getmousepos(a,b)
    Mouse(a,b,5,5,true)
    wait(1500+randomadd)
    if(findcolortolerance(a,b,65536,485,40,486,41,50)) then
    begin
    Mouse(a,b,5,5,true)
    wait(1500)
    end;
    randomplox;
    end else
    begin
    writeln(‘WTF! Couldnt find bank color…’)
    TerminateScript;
    end;
    end;

procedure fletch;
begin
found:=0;
randomplox;
repeat
found := found + 1;
Mouse(674,443,5,5,true)
wait(8+randomadd)
randomplox;
Mouse(716,443,5,5,true)
wait(6+randomadd)
randomplox;
strung := strung + 1;
Mouse(716,443,5,5,true)
wait(10+randomadd)
randomplox;
Mouse(674,443,5,5,true)
wait(4+randomadd)
randomplox;
strung := strung + 1;
until(found = 7)
if(findcolor(a,b,bsc,650,427,684,466) = false) then
begin
Mouse(651,184,2,2,true)
end;
end;
procedure dragstring;
begin
randomplox;
MMouse(622,337,1,1)
wait(100)
getmousepos(a,b)
holdmouse(a,b,true)
wait(500+randomadd)
MMouse(671,441,5,5)
wait(100)
getMousepos(a,b)
wait(50)
releasemouse(a,b,true)
randomplox;
holdmouse(a,b,true)
wait(500+randomadd)
MMouse(671,441,1,1)
wait(100)
getMousepos(a,b)
wait(50)
releasemouse(a,b,true)
end;

procedure report;
begin
Newline := newline //gets rid of anoying message lol
slen:= length(inttostr(strung))
blen:= length(inttostr(bankd))

writeln(’#############################################’)
writeln(‘Bows Strung:’+inttostr(strung))
writeln(‘Banks Done: ‘+inttostr(bankd))
writeln(‘Xp Gained(if yews):’+inttostr(strung*75))
writeln(’#############################################’)
end;
begin
cleardebug;
pickcolor(color,a,b)
wait(75)
pickcolor(bsc,a,b)
writeln(‘Bank Color:’+inttostr(color))
Mouse(656,187,5,5,true)
wait(100+randomadd)
if(findcolor(a,b,color,212,88,394,274))then
begin
randomplox;
Mouse(a,b,2,2,true)
randomplox;
wait(750+randomadd)
Mouse(477,76,5,5,true)
wait(300+randomadd)
MMouse(487,40,2,2)
getmousepos(a,b)
getmousepos(a,b)
Mouse(a,b,5,5,true)
wait(1500+randomadd)
if(findcolortolerance(a,b,65536,485,40,486,41,50)) then
begin
Mouse(a,b,5,5,true)
wait(1500)
end;
wait(500)
randomplox;
end else
begin
writeln(‘WTF! Couldnt find bank color…’)
Logout;
terminatescript;
end;
repeat
randomplox;
mousespeed := 5+randomadd;
benmouse := true;
wait(100)
dragstring;
fletch;
Bank;
report;
until(false)
end.
[/scar]

Makes Aproximately 2.5k an hour.
Heres a progress report i got… it wouldve been longer but my lil bro moved the mouse to piss me off

Bows Strung:504 Banks Done: 36 Xp Gained(if yews):37800

Read full topic
